mapper.sql: id, order_number, seed_id, user_id, buy_count, buy_amount, add_time,pay_time,seq_no,account_pay_amount,car_pay_amount,reduce_pay_amount, close_time,state
mapper.select:
select t1.*, t2.seed_type as seed_type_id,t2.name as seed_name,t3.class_name as seed_type_name,t2.grow_days as seed_grow_days, t1.pay_time ,t1.add_time, t2.per_price as seed_price,t4.pic_url_thumb as pic_url from plant_seed_order_detail t1 left join plant_seed t2 on t1.seed_id = t2.id left join plant_seed_type t3 on t2.seed_type = t3.id left join plant_seed_pic t4 on t2.pic_ids = t4.id where t1.id = #{id}
and t1.user_id = #{userId}
